General.Name: Onechance
General.Description: Hangzhou Onechance Tech Crop. provides brand online marketing and management services. The company offers brand image building, product design planning, integrated marketing planning, material design, visual design, big data analysis, precision advertising delivery, pre-sales and after-sales service, online brand operations, CRM management, warehouse and logistics services, etc. It operates Tmall platforms. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

5.Name: Ms. Fan  Zhang
5.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
